def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

def has_soap_nearby(sink:item):
    # Check if there is soap close to the sink
    symbol has_soap=exists soap:item: is_soap(soap) and close(soap,sink)
    return has_soap

behavior fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # Ensure water is running
            
            if has_soap_nearby(sink):
                bind soap: item where:
                    is_soap(soap) and close(soap,sink)
                achieve_once inhand(soap)
                # Ensure soap is in hand
                wash(soap)
                # Wash soap under faucet to add soap to water
                achieve_once is_off(faucet)
                # Ensure water is turned off after filling
            
        else:
            observe(sink, "Check if there is a way to fill the sink with soapy water")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink)
